title: Warning
description: A warning generated by a primitive, documenting transformations, data loss, or quality concerns.

level.description: Severity tier: info (transformation happened), warning (data degraded), critical (results may be unreliable)

primitive.description: Name of the primitive that generated this warning

message.description: Human-readable explanation of what happened and why it matters
examples: CRS transformed from EPSG:4326 to EPSG:2263
3 parks excluded due to invalid geometry
LST raster has 40% NoData within study area
